siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Tired of spending too much time in back-to-back meetings and lengthy chat discussions? Try Threadit -- short video recordings to show your work, connect your team, and get your day back. Get started at threadit.app or learn more at threadit.area120.com
blogPost.body: Tired of spending too much time in back-to-back meetings and lengthy chat discussions? Try Threadit -- short video recordings to show your work, connect your team, and get your day back. Get started at threadit.app or learn more at threadit.area120.com
blogPost.title: Threadit by Google - Short video recordings for async collaboration
blogPost.author: Keller Smith

localize.description: 厌倦了在背靠背的会议和冗长的聊天讨论中花费太多时间？试试Threadit -- 短暂的视频记录来展示你的工作，连接你的团队，并让你的一天回归。开始在threadit.app或在threadit.area120.com了解更多。
localize.tagline: 用于异步协作的短视频录制

localize.description: 厭倦了在背靠背的會議和冗長的聊天討論中花費太多時間？試試Threadit -- 短暫的視頻記錄來展示你的工作，連接你的團隊，並讓你的一天迴歸。開始在threadit.app或在threadit.area120.com瞭解更多。
localize.tagline: 用於異步協作的短視頻錄製

previous.excerpt: Remote Choice provides you with relevant information to help you make a decision on where to live and work from remotely. Covering location guides, visas and more.
previous.title: Remote Choice - Discover where to live and work from remotely

localize.description: Remote Choice为您提供相关信息，帮助您决定在哪里远程生活和工作。涵盖地点指南、签证等内容。
localize.tagline: 发现远程生活和工作的地点

localize.description: Remote Choice爲您提供相關信息，幫助您決定在哪裏遠程生活和工作。涵蓋地點指南、簽證等內容。
localize.tagline: 發現遠程生活和工作的地點

next.excerpt: PERKS is for Remote Teams, Startups, Gig Workers, Students and many more! The future of work needs a new system to provide people the tools they need to live a happy and productive work life. We built PERKS to bring the best campus experience to everyone!
next.title: PERKS - The Google Campus Experience digitized

localize.description: PERKS适用于远程团队、创业公司、临时工、学生等。未来的工作需要一个新的系统来为人们提供所需的工具，让他们过上快乐和高效的工作生活。我们打造PERKS是为了给大家带来最好的校园体验!
PERKS適用於遠程團隊、創業公司、臨時工、學生等。未來的工作需要一個新的系統來爲人們提供所需的工具，讓他們過上快樂和高效的工作生活。我們打造PERKS是爲了給大家帶來最好的校園體驗!
